articles.content: Desktop-replacement laptops are typically big and heavy, but they usually make up for their lack of portability with roomy 17-inch screens, upgraded CPU and graphics performance, and plenty of ports … [+13507 chars]

articles.title: Eufy RoboVac G30 - Review 2020 - PCMag AU
articles.description: The relatively affordable Eufy RoboVac G30 robot vacuum has a compact design, strong suction power for its size, and smarter navigation than its predecessors.
articles.content: If youre looking for a robot vacuum that can fit in tight spaces, they don't get much more compact than the $349.99 Eufy RoboVac G30. At just 2.85 inches tall, it can clean where a lot of other robot… [+10430 chars]

articles.title: Colgate Magik - Review 2020 - PCMag AU
articles.description: The Colgate Magik toothbrush makes it fun to brush your teeth with an augmented reality smartphone app that teaches kids how to brush properly and rewards good oral hygiene habits.
